sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.SN_LicensingUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>SN_LicensingUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SN_LicensingUtils = Class.create();
SN_LicensingUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    initialize: function() {
        this.PER_USER_LICENSE = 0;
        this.CAPACITY_LICENSE = 1;
        this.MAX_USER_LICENSE = 2;
        this.UNLIMITED_USER_LICENSE = 3;
        this.LicenseType = Object.freeze({
            USER_BASED_LICENSES: Object.freeze([this.PER_USER_LICENSE, this.MAX_USER_LICENSE, this.UNLIMITED_USER_LICENSE]),
            CAPACITY_BASED_LICENSES: Object.freeze([this.CAPACITY_LICENSE])
        });
    },
    getUserBasedLicenses: function() {
        return this.LicenseType.USER_BASED_LICENSES;
    },

    getCapacityBasedLicenses: function() {
        return this.LicenseType.CAPACITY_BASED_LICENSES;
    },
    type: 'SN_LicensingUtils'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-10-14 22:18:08</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>7904162e773310100afbf62ad91061fd</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SN_LicensingUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Subscription Administration Base" source="com.snc.usage_admin.base">e823c9cf6d6620100acb70b3534330ff</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7904162e773310100afbf62ad91061fd</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-10-23 18:12:26</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>794</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
